hero.name: Hrida Zakaria
hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.description: I create beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. Passionate about clean code and elegant solutions.

about.subtitle: About Me
about.title: Let me introduce myself
about.bio1: I'm a passionate full-stack developer who loves building web applications and digital solutions. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive designs.
about.bio2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.
about.bio3: My goal is to always build applications that are scalable, efficient, and provide great user experiences.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform Jota
items.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, user authentication, and admin dashboard. Built with modern technologies for scalability and performance.

items.title: Game jumpyFrog
items.description: JumpyFrog is a simple arcade game made with Python and Pygame where you control a frog that jumps across obstacles and tries to reach the highest score. Fast, fun, and easy to play.

items.title: Weather Dashboard
items.description: A beautiful weather dashboard with location-based forecasts, interactive maps, and detailed weather analytics. Responsive design for all devices.

items.title: To-Do-List App
items.description: Web application to manage and track daily tasks with a simple interface, task marking, and local storage.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Built with performance and SEO in mind.

items.title: Diploma Full Stack Developer
items.company: Institut Spécialisé de Technologie Appliquée (ISTA) NTIC 2 SM
items.description: Focused on modern web technologies, software engineering, and full-stack development. Strengthened skills in front-end, back-end, databases, and application architecture while building real-world projects.

items.title: Certificate in Introduction to PHP
items.description: Completed an online certificate in Introduction to PHP from Simplilearn, gaining foundational skills in PHP programming and web development. https://simpli-web.app.link/e/30gHN3bTNYb

items.title: Certificate in English
items.description: Achieved a C1 English proficiency certificate from EF SET, demonstrating advanced skills in reading, writing, listening, and speaking. https://cert.efset.org/en/ZEpdVm

items.title: Bachelor of Science in Physics
items.description: Focused on physical sciences with a practical approach to scientific concepts. Developed strong skills in logic, analysis, and scientific methodology. Graduated with honors.

contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.name: Name
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message! I will get back to you soon.
contact.connectDescription: I'm always interested in hearing about new projects and opportunities. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!

footer.builtWith: Built with React, Vite, TailwindCSS & Framer Motion
